(I've got a tingly feeling now.  Like a kid, the IGL, is growing up.  No, 
wait, that's just diarrhea.  My bad.  Tankor, I said your guys were out, but 
since Rdahl left, you're back in.  Congrats, I'm assuming you're all at the 
arena, if not you're MAGICALLY there so we can start this thing)

Kaiser/Sinew/Scattershot:



Kaiser turned on the loudspeakers throughout the Otyebis.  "Let Round Two, 
begin."

---

Guards ushered the combatants into the arena.  The inside of the arena was a 
perfect forest full of different types of plants, grass, and trees that 
seemed to stand among clouds.  The sounds of birds and animals can be heard, 
but none can been seen.  Odd.  

"Hot Rod, Epyon, Scatterblaster, Dragoon, Khonkolor, Hellpeon, Penguin,
Nightstrike, Ultimo Campeon, Blacknightmare, Hugar, and Obsidian, prepare to 
fight!" a voice yelled over the loudspeaker.

(This match is a free-for-all.  The last two standing will get to go to Round 
Three.  Maximals could team up against baddies, but in the end there can be 
only...two!  This is your basic forest.  Streams, etc.  Everything a forest 
would have.  So if you magically find like a nuke in the forest that's a no 
no.  Enjoy.  I may have some things pop in to attack ya if I get the time to 
think something up)
